name: Tank Goodness (Prototype)
description:
Tank Goodness offers players a delve into a world  which has been radically altered after the affects of a nuclear winter has grasped the environment. Climate change has equally make its appearance known throughout the areas of the experience.

Tasked with surviving in this wasteland, you will be journeying through a world ripe with fresh snow and cities longing to make their presence known in the background as you venture through. Piloting a tank, seek for your purpose in this world and make your way to a destination unbeknownst to the protagonist. You must explore the world and take on two split perspectives of both the inside and outside of your tank.

The new world is a daunting one in Tank Goodness…but…ultimately, you’re the one with a tank.

Controls:

W - Move up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump/Fire Tank Weapons

E - Activate Tanks Lever and movement system, Pick up Fuel or Ammo

University Project
